revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_SelectSigilAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Jumps forward a number of frames based on the number of sigil pieces the weapon represents. It is assumed that each fire state consists of 4 frames. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sigil}} and derived classes.
